verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <WH5329> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> The heavens <WH8064> declare <WH5608> the glory <WH3519> of God; <WH410> and the firmament <WH7549> showeth <WH5046> his handiwork. <WH4639> <WH3027>
Day <WH3117> unto day <WH3117> uttereth <WH5042> speech, <WH562> and night <WH3915> unto night <WH3915> showeth <WH2331> knowledge. <WH1847>
There is no <WH369> speech <WH562> nor <WH369> language, <WH1697> where their voice <WH6963> is not <WH1097> heard. <WH8085>

Their line <WH6957> is gone out <WH3318> through all <WH3605> the earth, <WH776> and their words <WH4405> to the end <WH7097> of the world. <WH8398> In them hath he set <WH7760> a tabernacle <WH168> for the sun, <WH8121>
Which <WH1931> is as a bridegroom <WH2860> coming out <WH3318> of his chamber, <WH4480> <WH2646> and rejoiceth <WH7797> as a strong man <WH1368> to run <WH7323> a race. <WH734>

His going forth <WH4161> is from the end <WH4480> <WH7097> of the heaven, <WH8064> and his circuit <WH8622> unto <WH5921> the ends <WH7098> of it: and there is nothing <WH369> hid <WH5641> from the heat <WH4480> <WH2535> thereof.

The law <WH8451> of the LORD <WH3068> is perfect, <WH8549> converting <WH7725> the soul: <WH5315> the testimony <WH5715> of the LORD <WH3068> is sure, <WH539> making wise <WH2449> the simple. <WH6612>

The statutes <WH6490> of the LORD <WH3068> are right, <WH3477> rejoicing <WH8055> the heart: <WH3820> the commandment <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> is pure, <WH1249> enlightening <WH215> the eyes. <WH5869>
The fear <WH3374> of the LORD <WH3068> is clean, <WH2889> enduring <WH5975> forever: <WH5703> the judgments <WH4941> of the LORD <WH3068> are true <WH571> and righteous <WH6663> altogether. <WH3162>

More to be desired <WH2530> are they than gold, <WH4480> <WH2091> yea, than much <WH7227> fine gold: <WH4480> <WH6337> sweeter <WH4966> also than honey <WH4480> <WH1706> and the honeycomb. <WH5317> <WH6688>
Moreover <WH1571> by them is thy servant <WH5650> warned: <WH2094> and in keeping <WH8104> of them there is great <WH7227> reward. <WH6118>
Who <WH4310> can understand <WH995> his errors? <WH7691> cleanse <WH5352> thou me from secret <WH4480> <WH5641> faults.

Keep back <WH2820> thy servant <WH5650> also <WH1571> from presumptuous <WH4480> <WH2086> sins; let them not <WH408> have dominion <WH4910> over me: then <WH227> shall I be upright, <WH8552> and I shall be innocent <WH5352> from the great <WH7227> transgression. <WH4480> <WH6588>

Let the words <WH561> of my mouth, <WH6310> and the meditation <WH1902> of my heart, <WH3820> be <WH1961> acceptable <WH7522> in thy sight, <WH6440> O LORD, <WH3068> my strength, <WH6697> and my redeemer. <WH1350>
